targets.expr: sum (sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(container) *8

sum (sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(container) *8

panels.title: KubeVela Core network bandwidth per second
